title: Polki & Ruby Blossom Dangle Earrings - Sundari Jhumki
features: A modern take on the classic Jhumka design. The unique geometric top section features a captivating Polki diamond secured within a delicately crafted open bezel setting. A ruby cabochon, surrounded by polki petals, dangles gracefully below, catching the light with every movement. The intricate gold work showcases a subtle Hyderabadi polish, lending a rich, antique-inspired look.
colors: Predominantly warm tones with a rich red Ruby
complemented by the brilliance of white Polki diamonds and the golden hue of the 22K gold. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a slightly muted
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of traditional elegance to contemporary outfits. Ideal for festive occasions
or even paired with a Kanjeevaram saree for a Seemantham or Half-Saree Function.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality, uncut Polki diamonds and a vibrant Ruby cabochon adds to their value and appeal. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the antique look and feel, making them a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. A statement piece that reflects both heritage and style.
